name: VR Katherine
description:
VR Katherine is a perfect girlfriend simulator. She is beautiful, very creative, and you can interact with her and with the scenario in SO many ways!
With VR you can use your hands to interact with her, touch Katherine's body and change animations like if it was real! Imagine how cool is that?

Kiss her, stimulate her, talk to her, customize everything!

VR Device is not mandatory! but it will be awesome with it!


Customization
Customize Katherine's face to look like someone you know in real life or to idealize the perfect girl for you!
Change her clothes, eye and hair's color, body shape, breast size and more! The possibilities are huge!

You have your own avatar in the game (of course you can hide it if you want). And it is also customizable!
Using VR, you can customize your hands and interact with Katherine directly.

MAIN FEATURES
- 15 skin textures to customize your girl.
- 14 face presets to use, and the ability to mix them (creating an almost infinite amount of possibilities).
- A very 3D realistic house.
- Sex Positions with interaction.
- Artificial Intelligence, girl dances, talks, sit beside you.
- Sexy and sensual clothes.
- Personalized voice.
- Use your Mouse or VR Headset

"all characters in this game are 18+"
* VR Katherine is NOT just a slideshow, novel or video experience.
** VR Katherine is a SEX SIMULATOR. AWESOME AND REALISTIC
*** VR Katherine ALL SCREENSHOTS AND VIDEO are from the REAL GAMEPLAY
**** YOU DO NOT NEED TO USE A VR HEADSET. WORKS PERFECTLY WITH MOUSE.
***** WITH VR HEADSET IS REALLY AWESOME!
